scripts.refresh: rm -rf ./node_modules/react-native-palette;cd ..;find . -name .git -prune -o -name node_modules -prune -o -name example -prune -o -type d -exec mkdir -p ./example/node_modules/react-native-palette/{} \; -o -exec cp {} ./example/node_modules/react-native-palette/{} \; ;cd example;node node_modules/react-native/local-cli/cli.js start
